<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 2: Approve Expenses](/Rules.aspx?ID=1802)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 538</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
You can draw upon the kingdom's funds to enhance the standard of living for its citizens by attempting the [Improve Lifestyle](/Actions.aspx?ID=1402) activity or you can attempt a withdrawal from the kingdom's funds using the [Tap Treasury](/Actions.aspx?ID=1404) activity.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
